dialogue.introduction: Destroyer class, Ooshio~! A small body with a large torpedoes! Leave it to me.
dialogue.library_intro: Second of the Asashio-class destroyers, Ooshio! After being sent into the frontlines, I've mobilized to Guadalcanal for evacuation missions three times. I'll support you!
dialogue.secretary2: Y-yeah, that feeling, lets' raise it up
dialogue.secretary3: Hey hey, it's still early stage of a campaign
dialogue.secretaryidle: Commander! I'll always, always, always watch you from here!
dialogue.secretarymarried: Commander, how are you these days? Have you become rich?
dialogue.wedding: Do you know the meaning of 'Ooshio'? It's when the gravitational pull of the moon draws the waves up. In short, it's when there's a moon about.
dialogue.equipment1: Hauaa~ Strengthening is such a warm feeling.
dialogue.equipment2: Uoooo! I've been version upped in a lot of ways!
dialogue.supply: Hauaa~ Strengthening is such a warm feeling.
dialogue.docking_moderate_damage: Uuahh~, I lost, I really lost~
dialogue.ship_construction: New comrades just keep appearing, don't they?
dialogue.start_a_sortie: Leave the torpedo warfare to me!
dialogue.mvp: Commander! Please tell me if you have any problem. I'll always help you!
dialogue.sunk: Oh no... I guess... this is as far, as I can go...
dialogue.fall_2015: Commander, autumn's here! The 8th destroyer division will now gather dry leaves and commence our mission "bake sweet potatoes"! Even in autumn we're in high spirits!
dialogue.christmas_2015: Admiral! Together with Ooshio lets be merry with full power on Christmas! Celebrating in high spirit!
dialogue.end_of_year_2015: Admiral, it's the end of the year. We should clean with whump. Ooshio will also do her part in cleaning. I'll merrily do it!
dialogue.new_year_2016: Commander, Happy New Year! This year too, we'll proceed in high spirits!
dialogue.setsubun_2016: Commander, it's Setsubun! Naturally, I will be in high spirit! Look at Asashio-nee, she is throwing beans at full power! Ooshio will also participate! Ei, eii!
